attributes.action: Charge all Foreign Lorries for road useage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Charge all foreign lorries  a daily  amount for use of our roads and facilities, payable prior to exitting the country . The same as all vehicles from this country have to pay in road tolls whilst travelling  in europe,as wellas us having to pay road tax.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Charge all Foreign Lorries for road useage."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14894.asp

Prime Minister's Office
